 1: <?php
 2: 
 3: namespace Instagram\Providers;
 4: 
 5: use Instagram\Helpers\RedirectLoginHelper;
 6: use Instagram\Http\Sessions\DataStoreInterface;
 7: use League\Container\ServiceProvider\AbstractServiceProvider;
 8: use League\OAuth2\Client\Provider\Instagram;
 9: 
10: /**
11:  * CoreServiceProvider
12:  *
13:  * @package    Instagram
14:  * @author     Hassan Khan <contact@hassankhan.me>
15:  * @link       https://github.com/hassankhan/instagram-sdk
16:  * @license    MIT
17:  */
18: class CoreServiceProvider extends AbstractServiceProvider
19: {
20:     /**
21:      * The provides array is a way to let the container
22:      * know that a service is provided by this service
23:      * provider. Every service that is registered via
24:      * this service provider must have an alias added
25:      * to this array or it will be ignored.
26:      *
27:      * @var array
28:      */
29:     protected $provides = [
30:         'provider',
31:         RedirectLoginHelper::class
32:     ];
33: 
34:     /**
35:      * Use the register method to register items with the container via the
36:      * protected $this->container property or the `getContainer` method
37:      * from the ContainerAwareTrait.
38:      *
39:      * @return void
40:      */
41:     public function register()
42:     {
43:         $container = $this->getContainer();
44:         $config    = $container->get('config');
45: 
46:         $container->share('provider', function() use ($config) {
47:             return new Instagram([
48:                 'clientId'     => $config->get('client_id'),
49:                 'clientSecret' => $config->get('client_secret'),
50:                 'redirectUri'  => $config->get('redirect_url'),
51:             ]);
52:         });
53: 
54:         $container->share(DataStoreInterface::class, function() use ($config) {
55:             $class = $config->get('session_store');
56:             return new $class();
57:         });
58: 
59:         $container->share(RedirectLoginHelper::class, function() use ($container) {
60:             return new RedirectLoginHelper(
61:                 $container->get('provider'),
62:                 $container->get(DataStoreInterface::class)
63:             );
64:         });
65:     }
66: }
